title: 14 Acre Coconut Land for Sale
details:
14 acres of coconut land for immediate sale in Dummalasuriya - North Western province of Sri Lanka in the area which is known as the Coconut Triangle.

In addition to main plantation, under planted trees are about to bear.

Medium size house and electricity. Water from a residential well and a large agricultural well.
Water tank with irrigation pipe lines throughout the land.

Rectangular land bordering roads from three sides. Adjoining proposed access road to Bingiriya Industrial Zone and with strategic value.
